responsibilities: Set up a documentation server and page for streamlined knowledge sharing.
Engineered AWS pipelines, integrating bash scripting for automated deployments, slashing deployment time by 40%.
Boosted user satisfaction by 25% and engagement through frontend optimisations using Figma, Lighthouse, and SVG formats.
Implemented Google OAuth for secure user authentication and a seamless login experience.
Ensured smooth integration between frontend and backend systems through rigorous testing and debugging with Postman.
Reduced debugging time by 50% by implementing PageDuty for developers.
Used Jira and Confluence to maintain internal resources, document roadmap and tickets which ensured the team was aligned on our OKRs.
Monitored OKR progress with CTO and tech leadership on a monthly basis.
Participated in company initiatives focused on the Tech department, including sessions on backend services and banking APIs.

Enhanced customer experience of the billing system through integrations of third-party providers such as Payfunnels for an easy payment process, handling recurring payments that increased customer satisfaction by 76%.
Increased agency website click-through rate by 18%+ in 30 days through implementing web development and SEO best practices.
Gained insight into the performance and monitoring by using real user monitoring on our main website (Lighthouse and Sentry). 20% of my workload involved programming in JavaScript and React.js.

side_projects.description: Developed a 15-week program and coordinated a group of women students to deliver a web app using MIT App Inventor.
Using Netlify and Vercel for deployment and React.js for development.
